name: Ghosts of Geometry
description:
Fight off the swarm of enemies! But don't forget, you need to teleport to the spirit world to connect your fallen enemies souls with their bodies!

CONTROLS:

MOVE - WASD / ARROWS

TELEPORT - SPACE

SHOOT (NORMAL BULLET) - LEFT MOUSE BUTTON

SHOOT (CONNECTER BULLET) - RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON

 

IMPORTANT:

How to kill NORMAL ENEMIES: Hit them with GREEN BULLET (LMB)

How to kill GHOSTS: HIT them with PURPLE BULLET (RMB), THEN hit their dead body (shown by purple bullet marker) with PURPLE BULLET (RMB)

Everything freezes in one world when you teleport to another, so be careful! Don't wanna teleport back right on a bullet now would ya!
